nodes.text: PK-series worker droids were a model of labor droid used by the Trade Federation. During the Invasion of Naboo, a number of PK units were stationed on board the Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter Saak'ak. The Confederacy of Independent Systems later came to use the PK-series for most support functions in their Droid Army. The PK-Ultra worker droid had a similar name and existed by the time of the Resistance.
